oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Affidavit for Civil War supplies furnished to Col. George W. Kirk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sworn affidavit, Washington County, Tenn., from Nancy Tinker regarding supplies she furnished during the war to Col. George W. Kirk of the 3rd North Carolina Infantry. Probably filed in connection with a U.S. Court of Claims application. See also A. Christine Tipton's book, "Civil War in the Mountains."
